texto: detailed elements of 5.2 Maturity level Conclusion Subclause Level Itema YES Results/commentb 5.2.1 The interested parties are determined, including Relevant their needs and expectations and whether the interested associated risks and opportunities are informal parties or ad hoc. 2 Processes to meet the needs of some interested parties are established. Ongoing relationships with interested parties are established as informal or ad hoc. 3 Processes for determining which interested parties are relevant are in place.
